headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Howmet Aerospace (HWM) Pivot Toward High-Margin Aftermarket And CAM Deal
summary: In recent months, Howmet Aerospace reported strong Q3 2025 results with revenue up 14%, repeatedly raised its 2025 guidance, and agreed to acquire Consolidated Aerospace Manufacturing from Stanley Black & Decker for US$1.80 billion in cash, a deal expected to add nearly US$500 million in annual revenue and deliver a significant 2026 tax benefit. Together with Howmet’s pivot toward higher-margin aftermarket services and its concentration in critical engine components, these moves highlight a...

headline: Howmet Aerospace to Host Webcast and Announce Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Results
summary: Howmet Aerospace Inc. (NYSE: HWM) will announce its fourth quarter and full year 2025 financial results on Thursday, February 12, 2026. The press release and presentation materials will be available at approximately 7:00 AM ET on February 12, 2026, via the "Investors" section of the Howmet Aerospace website.

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Howmet Aerospace (HWM) After An 81% One Year Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether Howmet Aerospace's current share price still makes sense after a strong run, this article will walk through what that price might be implying about the company. The stock last closed at US$220.25, with returns of 4.4% over 7 days, 11.7% over 30 days, 4.0% year to date and 81.2% over 1 year, along with a very large return over 3 and 5 years that is around 7x over 5 years. Recent coverage has focused on Howmet Aerospace as a long term structural supplier to...
